decls.name: error message
decls.comment: We set this to a non-empty error message if the user enters an invalid number.

displayBody.text: example 1: make a box that contains 5 boxes laid out horizontally
example 2: make a box that contains 5 boxes laid out vertically
example 3: make a box that contains 5 boxes that are overlaid

body.text: To create 5 boxes, we simply write a loop with 5 iterations
each iteration creates a new box
this box has fixed square size
and equal margins all the way around
Let's make the background transparent green
We want to print the number in the center of the box... this is done by putting the number in a nested box
we want this box to show the number
and center it inside the containing box
